CLOSE: as opposed to open sth, CLOSE sth means changing the state from OPEN to CLOSE, not get close to!
DRINK: drink up sth, or consume a DRINKABLE item (often a RECIPIENT with liquid). Must be holding it.
FIND: find and get near to sth,locate and approach the target so the agent is NEAR it (room traversal allowed).
WALK: walk towards sth, get near to sth to become NEAR it (use when the room/object is known).
GRAB: grab sth,or pick up a GRABBABLE item so the agent holds it. must be near the item.
OPEN: open sth, as opposed to close sth
PUTBACK: Place object A back ON/IN object B (A must be GRABBABLE; B can be a surface or container).
PUTIN: Put object A INTO object B (A must be GRABBABLE; B must be CAN_OPEN).
PUTOBJBACK: put object back to its original place
RUN: run towards sth, get close to sth.faster variant of WALK
SIT: sit on sth,must be NEAR it
SWITCHOFF: switch sth off (normally lamp/light),target must be HAS_SWITCH.
SWITCHON: switch sth on (normally lamp/light),target must be HAS_SWITCH.
PUTON: put on clothes, need to hold the clothes first
DROP: drop something in robot's current room, need to hold the thing first
READ: read something, need to hold the thing first
LIE: lie on something, need to get close the thing first
POUR: pour object A into object B,(A must be POURABLE & DRINKABLE; B must be RECIPIENT).
PUSH: move sth,push a MOVABLE target away from the agent.
PULL: move sth,park a MOVABLE target toward the agent.
SQUEEZE: Squeeze CLOTHES to remove water (must be holding).
PLUGIN: plug in the plug,target must be HAS_PLUG and currently PLUGGED_OUT
PLUGOUT: plug out the plug,target must be HAS_PLUG and currently PLUGGED_IN
EAT: eat some food,must be holding the food first
RELEASE: Release (drop) the currently held object in the current room (similar to DROP).
